update t_customer_info set cust_type = #{custType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, in_code = #{inCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, out_code = #{outCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cust_name = #{custName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cust_en_name = #{custEnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cust_abbreviation = #{custAbbreviation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cust_status = #{custStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, business_type = #{businessType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_license = #{isLicense,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cust_role = #{custRole,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cust_mobile = #{custMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cust_email = #{custEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cust_web = #{custWeb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_white = #{isWhite,jdbcType=INTEGER}, regist_time = #{registTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, corportae_assets = #{corportaeAssets,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, staff_number = #{staffNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, developers_number = #{developersNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, business_introduction = #{businessIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, advantages_introduction = #{advantagesIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, active = #{active,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select cust.id, cust.in_code, cust.out_code, cust.cust_name, cust.cust_en_name, cust.cust_abbreviation, cust.cust_mobile, cust.cust_email, cust.cust_web, bank.bank_id, bank.cust_id, bank.bank_name, bank.bank_detail_info as bank_address, bank.bank_account, bank.bank_bic, assets.assete_info_id, assets.cust_id, assets.assets_year, assets.assets_season, assets.assets_total, assets.assets_net, assets.revenue, assets.total_staff, business.bus_info_id, business.cust_id, business.product_line, business.revenue_pl_one, business.revenue_pl_two, business.revenue_pl_three, agent.agent_id, agent.cust_id, agent.bu, agent.pdt, agent.territory, agent.sales_model, agent.grade, agent.start_date, agent.end_date, file.file_id, file.cust_id, file.type, file.title, file.file_name, file.file_path, contact.contact_id, contact.cust_id, contact.contact_name, contact.mobile, contact.email, contact.department, contact.sub_department, contact.position, contact.equity_ratio, ship.ship_id, ship.cust_id, ship.corporate_type, ship.corporate_name, invoice.invoice_id, invoice.cust_id, invoice.purchasing_unit, invoice.shipping_address, invoice.shipping_mobile, invoice.taxpayer_registration_number, invoice.currency, sales.sales_id, sales.cust_id, sales.sales_organize, sales.distribution_channel, sales.delivery_plant, address.address_id, address.cust_id, address.address_type, address.country, address.province, address.city, address.district, address.address_detail, account.team_id, account.cust_id, account.account_mobile, account.role_type, account.account_name
from t_customer_info cust left join t_cust_bank_info bank on bank.cust_id = cust.id and bank.active=1 left join t_assets_information assets on assets.cust_id = cust.id and assets.active=1 left join t_business_information business on business.cust_id = cust.id and business.active =1 left join t_customer_agent agent on agent.cust_id = cust.id and agent.active=1 left join t_customer_file file on file.cust_id = cust.id and file.active=1 left join t_customer_contact contact on contact.cust_id = cust.id and contact.active=1 left join t_cust_corporate_relationship ship on ship.cust_id = cust.id and ship.active=1 left join t_cust_invoice_info invoice on invoice.cust_id = cust.id and invoice.active=1 left join t_cust_sales sales on sales.cust_id = cust.id and sales.active=1 left join t_customer_address address on address.cust_id = cust.id and address.active=1 left join t_customer_account_team account on account.cust_id = cust.id and account.active=1 where cust.business_type = 'A04' and cust.active =1 and cust.id=#{id}

select cust.id, cust.in_code, cust.out_code, cust.cust_name, cust.cust_en_name, cust.cust_abbreviation, cust.cust_mobile, cust.cust_email, cust.cust_web, cust.is_license, cust.corportae_assets, cust.staff_number, cust.developers_number, cust.business_introduction, rep.id, rep.customer_id, rep.report_dealer, rep.report_sales, rep.report_status, rep.report_time, pro.pro_id, pro.report_id, pro.cust_id, pro.report_id, pro.product, pro.p_month, pro.product_id, bank.bank_id, bank.report_id, bank.cust_id, bank.bank_name, bank.bank_detail_info as bank_address, bank.bank_account, bank.bank_bic, file.file_id, file.report_id, file.cust_id, file.type, file.title, file.file_name, file.file_path, contact.contact_id, contact.type, contact.report_id, contact.cust_id, contact.contact_name, contact.mobile, contact.email, contact.department, contact.sub_department, contact.position, contact.equity_ratio, ship.ship_id, ship.report_id, ship.cust_id, ship.corporate_type, ship.corporate_name, invoice.invoice_id, invoice.report_id, invoice.cust_id, invoice.purchasing_unit, invoice.shipping_address, invoice.shipping_mobile, invoice.taxpayer_registration_number, invoice.currency, sales.sales_id, sales.report_id, sales.cust_id, sales.sales_organize, sales.distribution_channel, sales.delivery_plant, address.address_id, address.report_id, address.cust_id, address.address_type, address.country, address.province, address.city, address.district, address.address_detail, account.team_id, account.report_id, account.cust_id, account.account_mobile, account.role_type, account.account_name
from t_customer_info cust inner join t_customer_report rep on rep.customer_id = cust.id and rep.active=1 left join t_customer_product pro on pro.report_id = rep.rep_id and pro.cust_id=cust.id and pro.active=1 left join t_customer_file file on file.cust_id = cust.id and file.report_id = rep.rep_id and file.active=1 left join t_customer_contact contact on contact.cust_id = cust.id and contact.report_id = rep.rep_id and contact.active=1 left join t_cust_bank_info bank on bank.cust_id = cust.id and bank.report_id = rep.rep_id and bank.active=1 left join t_cust_corporate_relationship ship on ship.cust_id = cust.id and ship.report_id = rep.rep_id and ship.active=1 left join t_cust_invoice_info invoice on invoice.cust_id = cust.id and invoice.report_id = rep.rep_id and invoice.active=1 left join t_cust_sales sales on sales.cust_id = cust.id and sales.report_id = rep.rep_id and sales.active=1 left join t_customer_address address on address.cust_id = cust.id and address.active=1 and address.report_id = rep.rep_id left join t_customer_account_team account on account.cust_id = cust.id and account.active=1 and account.report_id = rep_i where cust.id=${custId} and cust.active=1 and rep.id=#{reportId}

select * from t_customer_info cust inner join t_customer_report rep on rep.customer_id = cust.id where cust.active=1 and cust.business_type in ('A02','A03') and rep.active =1 and cust.cust_name = #{custName}
select cust_name, in_code from t_customer_info where active = 1 and create_user = #{userId}
select id, out_code, cust_name from t_customer_info order by create_time desc
select cust_email from t_customer_info where cust_name = #{custName} and active = 1
